author: kaz
msg: Combined the Date and Time columns into one so they can be wrapped with
Date on top of Time.  This helps reduce wasted screen space.

author: kaz
msg: Typo.

author: kaz
msg: - Updated to the latest and greatest stylesheets from our friends over
at style.tigris.org.  This resulted in the removal and addition of a
few stylesheets.  They re-organized the stylesheets for greater
flexibility.
- Created two local Maven stylesheets that contain the Maven local
modifications to the style.tigris.org stylesheets.  This enables us to
update the style.tigris.org stylesheets in a much easier fashion (just
replace them).  The local Maven stylesheets use the "cascading"
feature of stylesheets to override some settings in the tigris
stylesheets.
- Changed the default look for <source> regions.  I never cared for the
yellow boxes I initially chose when fitting the xdoc to the scarab
look and feel.  The new look is a very simple box around the source
(similar to anakia but the boxes is a consistent width).
- Users can now customize the colors used when Maven generates the web
site for a project.  These customizations are in the form of
properties that can be overridden.  The defaults are specified in
Maven's default.properties file, and users can override these color
settings in their project's project.properties file.  The build system
uses Ant's filter mechanism to replace the color selections specified
via properties in the local Maven stylesheets.  For example, if you
want to change the blue banner and blue section header to green, you
would add the following two properties to your project.properties
file:
ui.banner.background = #00500f
ui.section.background = #00500f
- Lastly, updated all of the documentation to reflect this new feature.
Also fully documented each color property in the Properties document.
There are a total of 37 customizable color properties that can be set.

author: kaz
msg: Added a 'maven:docs-quick' target that can be used for testing out
changes to the color scheme without having to wait for the generation of
all site documentation (such as checkstyle, changelog, unit test, metric
reports).  Also updated the documentation to reflect the new target.

author: kaz
msg: Creating the start of the beta4 announcement.
